original_text: Then he took a member of the royal family and made a treaty with him, putting him under oath. He also carried away the leading men of the land,
korean_text: 그 왕족 중에서 하나를 택하여 언약을 세우고 그에게 맹세하게 하고 또 그 땅의 능한 자들을 옮겨 갔나니

sentences.original_text: Then he took a member of royal family
and made a treaty with him
He also carried away leading men of land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그 땅의 지도자들을 데려갔습니다
